alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harlan, southwestern Letcher and southeastern Perry Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delphia, or 14 miles south of Hazard, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Banks and Hallie around 350 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lilley Cornett Woods, Diane, Gordon, Defeated Creek, Hiram, Skyline, Kingdom Come S.P., Cumberland, Linefork, Flint, Benham, Blair, Clutts, Kings Creek, Lynch, Lewis Creek, Partridge, Maggard, Clover, Big Black Mountain, Rock House and Clover Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
